description: Short online quizzes per lecture testing understanding of key course material. Final mark is an average of all quizzes.
15-minute oral exam with two examiners. Students select two questions from provided topics, focusing on physical understanding of phenomena. Allows use of course materials during preparation.
15-minute oral exam assessing first half of course material. Focuses on conceptual understanding through discussion with two examiners, delivered via videocall or in-person.
